title: Logging into Chat Service
body:
For the past 3 days my League of legends Launcher has been saying logging into chat cant Invite or chat.
I have tried many things to try and fix.
Closing and changing the date. No outcome
Repairing my league of Legends launcher. Still no outcome.
May work for some people.

Please help, 
Riot

replies.body:
I'd say to hold tight for a bit, as the servers are currently experiencing a few different problems, such as clients crashing on them and other generally disconnections. [This discussion](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/qGggBnHi-lol-client-crash-may-22nd) would probably be a good indicator of the current state of things.

In the mean time, could you specify your OS and ISP?
